Text:
its 800bitrate and since no fast movements scenes in house
like water or race cars you wont notice much of a difference
from 1000bit or 1500bit rates no pixels like from what I saw

not sure why some mp4s wont convert how you want
but I think the soft drops some frames not needed
or perhaps its a bug in the soft lol..
A V 10 appreciate the avi, really hate everyone is using the mp4 format now. It doesn't work on xbox or DVD player. Conversion is a real pain.

:) watched it all good.. another great episode
going to miss this series when this season ends for the last time
